verses.verse: Vindicate<WH8199> me,<WH430> God, and plead<WH7378> my cause<WH7379> against an ungodly<WH3808> nation.<WH1471> Oh,<WH6403> deliver me from deceitful<WH4820> and wicked<WH5766> men.<WH376>
For you are the God<WH430> of my strength.<WH4581> Why have you rejected<WH2186> me?<WH1980> Why do I go mourning<WH6937> because of the oppression<WH3906> of the enemy?<WH341>
Oh,<WH7971> send out your light<WH216> and your truth.<WH571> Let them lead<WH5148> me.<WH935> Let them bring me to your holy<WH6944> hill,<WH2022> To your tents.<WH4908>
Then I will go<WH935> to the altar<WH4196> of God,<WH430> to God,<WH410> my exceeding<WH8057> joy.<WH1524> I will praise<WH3034> you on the harp,<WH3658> God,<WH430> my God.<WH430>

Why are you in despair,<WH7817> my soul?<WH5315> Why are you disturbed<WH1993> within me?<WH3176> Hope in God!<WH430> For I shall still praise<WH3034> him:<WH6440> my Savior, my helper,<WH3444> and my God.<WH430>
